name: Air Hockey: The Canadian Practice Sports Table - Free
name_original: Air Hockey: The Canadian Practice Sports Table - Free
description:
SIMPLY INDOOR ENTERTAINMENT !

Air hockey is very popular game, where two players have to play with puck by using mallet. On both sides of your table there are two slots which serves as goal. If you push your puck on opposite side and puck drops into slot then you will get a point.

DOWNLOAD AIR HOCKEY : THE CANADIAN PRACTICE SPORTS TABLE for FREE now!
